name: Binary Carpenter Ultimate Scroll To Top Button
author: bc2018

sections.description:
Have you ever wanted to have a the scroll to top button that lets your reader scroll to the top of your website easily? Well, most themes now have that option. However, they are
not flexible.

You can watch the tutorial here: https://youtu.be/cHCPk5dRNHc

With this plugin, you can change the images, change the text to whatever you want. The Scroll to top button will just work.

If you find the plugin useful, you may like my other works. I blog at Binary Carpenter
sections.installation: Just install it in your wordpress dashboard or upload the extracted folder to wp-content/plugins

short_description: This plugin let you create scroll to top button to your site easily. There are no limit of styles you can create.
